# Description of DataSchema variable

The description of harmonised variable is the following:

* Short name: `f_vig_pa`
* Variable label: `Frequency of vigorous exercise (weekly)`
* Variable description: `Frequency of vigorous exercise (weekly)`
* Domain: `Lifestyle and health behaviours`
* Value type: `categorical`
* Category coding:

**Code** | **Category Label**
-------- | ------------------
0        | never
1        | once per week (rarely)
2        | 2-3 days/times per week (sometimes)
3        | 4-5 days per week (often)
4        | 6-7 days per week (very often)

* Category missings: 

**Code** | **Category Label**
----| ------------------
991 | CAPI/interviewer error
992 | Impute
993 | Disable to measure
994 | Not attempt/not done
995 | Does not answer
996 | Not applicable
997 | Refuse
